eveHQMessage.title: UPDATE YOUR API KEYS
eveHQMessage.message:
As CCP are due to remove legacy API keys within the next few weeks, all EveHQ users should update to the new CAK system as soon as possible.

For some guidance, see the Wiki article at http://wiki.indiceve.com/doku.php?id=guide:user_guide:add_api_keys

Also, check the Wiki at http://wiki.indiceve.com/doku.php for additional help and support.




- The EveHQ Development Team
